TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TreeNodeStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style
Public NotInheritable Class TreeNodeStyle Inherits Style
public ref class TreeNodeStyle sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style

summary.span: 表示 控件中节点的样式。

span.span: Represents the style of a node in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类表示控件中节点的样式 。Use the class to represent the style of a node in the control. 控件允许您为每种不同的节点类型指定不同的样式特征 (例如字体大小和颜色) 。The control allows you to specify different style characteristics (such as font size and color) for each of the different node types. 下表列出了类支持的节点样式 。The following table lists the node styles that are supported by the class. |节点样式属性Node style property|说明Description| |-------------------------|-----------------| ||当鼠标指针位于节点上时该节点的样式设置。The style settings for a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||叶节点的样式设置。The style settings for the leaf nodes.| ||节点的默认样式设置。The default style settings for a node.| ||父节点的样式设置。The style settings for the parent nodes.| ||根节点的样式设置。The style settings for the root node.| ||所选节点的样式设置。The style settings for a selected node.| 当您设置控件的节点样式属性时 ，它们将按以下顺序应用：When you set the node style properties of the control, they are applied in the following order: 1. .. 2. 、 或 ，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 3. .. 4. .. 5. .. 类从类继承其大部分成员 。The class inherits most of its members from the class. 它 通过提供属性来扩展类，这些属性可控制节点中文本的空间大小，以及相邻节点之间的空间。It extends the class by providing properties that control the amount of space around the text in a node, as well as the space between adjacent nodes. 使用 属性可控制节点中文本左侧和右侧的空间量。Use the property to control the amount of space to the left and right of the text in a node. 同样， 属性控制节点中文本上方和下方的空间量。Similarly, the property controls the amount of space above and below the text in a node. 您可以通过设置属性来控制应用于的节点与相邻节点之间的间距量 。You can control the amount of spacing between the node that the is applied to and its adjacent nodes by setting the property. 若要控制父节点和子节点之间的间距量，请使用 属性。To control the amount of spacing between a parent node and a child node, use the property. 有关继承的样式设置的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about the inherited style settings, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 通过设置 从属性返回的对象的样式属性，来控制控件中父节点的外观 。The following code example demonstrates how to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the control by setting the style properties of the object that is returned from the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例， 方法 是使用参数指定的对象 `bag` 。Use the constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class by using the object that is specified by the `bag` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit ChildNodesPadding { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应用 类的父节点与子节点之间的间距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between a parent node and a child node to which the class is applied.

value.span: 父节点的子节点区域上方和下方的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, that is above and below the child nodes section of a parent node.
The default is 0 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制 类所应用到的节点的子节点部分上方和下方的空间量。Use the property to control the amount of space above and below the child nodes section of the node to which the class is applied. 此间距将插入父节点及其第一个子节点，以及其最后一个子节点和下一个节点之间。This spacing is inserted between the parent node and its first child node, as well as between its last child node and the next node. > [!NOTE] > 如果最后一个子节点后面没有其他节点，则不会呈现最后一个子节点后面的空格，因为这样做会在控件底部留下不必要的间隙。The space after the last child node is not rendered if there are no additional nodes following the last child node, because this would leave an unnecessary gap at the bottom of the control. 若要控制子节点之间的空间量，请使用 属性。To control the amount of space between child nodes, use the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定父节点的子节点部分上方和下方的空间。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the space above and below the child nodes section of a parent node. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The to copy.

summary.span: 将指定 对象的样式属性复制到当前 对象。

span.span: Copies the style properties of the specified object into the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可复制 调用此方法的对象中指定对象的样式属性 。Use the method to duplicate the style properties of the specified object in the object that calls this method. > [!NOTE] > 当前对象中的所有属性 都替换为指定对象中的相应属性 。All properties in the current object are replaced by the corresponding properties in the specified object. 若要在不替换任何已设置的值的情况下复制样式属性，请使用 方法。To copy style properties without replacing any values that have already been set, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将 指定对象的样式属性复制 到 调用此方法的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the style properties of the specified object into the object that calls this method. 请注意，每个样式属性都将被替换。Notice that every style property is replaced. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleCopyFrom/CS/treenodestylecopyfromcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleCopyFrom/VB/treenodestylecopyfromvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置节点中文本左边和右边的间距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space to the left and right of the text in the node.

value.span: 节点文本左边和右边的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, that is to the left and right of the node's text.
The default is 0 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制应用的节点的文本周围的水平空间量 。Use the property to control the amount of horizontal space around the text of the node to which the is applied. 此空间插入到文本的左边缘和文本区域的边框之间以及文本的右边缘和文本的边框之间。This space is inserted between the left edge of the text and the border of the text area, as well as between the right edge of the text and the border for the text. 若要控制垂直间距，请使用 属性。To control the vertical spacing, use the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来控制节点文本周围的水平空间。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the horizontal space around the text of a node. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]

member this.ImageUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置节点旁显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed next to the node.

value.span: 显示在节点旁边的自定义图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to a custom image that is displayed next to the node.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可为样式指定自定义图像。Use the property to specify a custom image for style. 此图像显示在节点旁边，并且可以采用任何图像文件格式 (如 .jpg、.gif、.bmp 等) ，只要客户端浏览器支持该格式即可。This image is displayed next to the node, and it can be in any image-file format (such as .jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format. 如果同时 设置了和 属性，则显示的图像是由属性指定的图像 。If both the and properties are set, the image that is displayed is the one that is specified by the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state.

span.span: The selected value is .

Public Overrides Sub MergeWith (s As Style)

param.name: s
param.span: 将与当前节点设置合并的 。

span.span: The that will merge with the current node's settings.

summary.span: 将指定 对象的样式属性与当前 对象的样式属性组合在一起。

span.span: Combines the style properties of the specified object with the style properties of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将指定对象的样式属性 与 从中调用此方法的对象的样式属性组合在一起。Use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with the style properties of the object that this method is called from. > [!NOTE] > 方法通过设置当前对象中未设置的每个属性 及其在指定对象中的相应值来联接样式属性 。The method joins the style properties by setting each property that is not set in the current object with its corresponding value in the specified object. 仅更新尚未设置的属性。Only properties that have not been set are updated. 如果未设置指定对象中的属性，则不 会更改当前对象中的相应属性 。If a property in the specified object is not set, the corresponding property in the current object does not change. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将 指定对象的样式属性 与调用此方法的对象的样式属性组合在一起 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with those of the object that calls this method. 请注意，仅 替换未设置的属性。Notice that only the unset properties are replaced. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleMergeWith/CS/treenodestylemergewithcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleMergeWith/VB/treenodestylemergewithvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit NodeSpacing { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit value); };
member this.NodeSpacing : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用 对象的节点与相邻节点之间的垂直间距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of vertical spacing between the node to which the object is applied and its adjacent nodes.

value.span: 应用 的节点与同一级别相邻节点之间的垂直间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of vertical space, in pixels, between the node to which the is applied and its adjacent nodes at the same level.
The default is 0 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制 应用到的节点与同一级别上的相邻节点之间的垂直间距量。Use the property to control the amount of vertical spacing between a node that the is applied to and its adjacent nodes at the same level. 此空间插入当前节点的上边缘和上一个节点的下边缘之间，以及当前节点的下边缘和下一个节点的上边缘之间的距离。This space is inserted between the upper edge of the current node and the lower edge of the previous node, as well as between the lower edge of the current node and upper edge of the next node. 不会为控件中的第一个节点呈现上部空间 ，因为这样做会在控件的顶部留下不必要的间隙。The upper space is not rendered for the first node in the control, because this would leave an unnecessary gap at the top of the control. 和 属性是独立应用的。The and properties are applied independently. 是否展开节点不会影响节点的间距。Whether or not the node is expanded does not affect the node spacing. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定节点与其在树中的相邻节点之间的垂直间距。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the vertical spacing between a node and its adjacent nodes at the same level in the tree. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可删除任何以前定义的样式元素，并将 对象重置为其原始 (，即默认) 状态。Use the method to remove any previously defined style elements and reset the object to its original (that is, default) state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将 对象返回到其默认状态。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to return the object to its default state. summary.span: 获取或设置节点文本上方和下方的间距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space above and below the text for a node.

value.span: 节点文本上方和下方的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, above and below a node's text.
The default is 0 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制类所应用到的节点的文本周围的垂直空间量 。Use the property to control the amount of vertical space around the text of the node to which the class is applied. 此空间插入到文本的上边缘和文本区域的边框之间以及文本的下边缘和文本的边框之间。This space is inserted between the upper edge of the text and the border of the text area, as well as between the lower edge of the text and the border for the text. 若要控制水平间距，请使用 属性。To control the horizontal spacing, use the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定节点文本周围的垂直空间。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the vertical space around the text of a node. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]
